name: phanerozoic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
from or referring to the period of time that started about 600 million years ago when many forms of life appeared: The oceans have become more acidic during the Phanerozoic eon. Phanerozoic rocks are not the only ones that contain fossils.
More examplesFewer examplesShe has written a dissertation on the structure of Phanerozoic sedimentary basins.The early Triassic is probably the most obscure period in the long history of Phanerozoic time.Much of the area is covered by Phanerozoic granite.

Specific periods of time
the Phanerozoic
the period of time that started about 600 million years ago when many forms of life appeared: The Phanerozoic is divided into the Palaeozoic, Mesozoic, and Cenozoic eras. The Precambrian era occurred before the Phanerozoic.
More examplesFewer examplesThe chemistry of sea water has changed over the course of the Phanerozoic.The Earth has gone through cool spells right through the late Phanerozoic.
